the bill will discriminate and penalize

well i would hope that the unhcr are as

the fact is that all of these people

france is a safe country with a fully

the fact is that nobody has cause to get

nobody should be taking that risk so you

i would argue that we are fully

used of course there's also um the work

it comes down to the european court of

which decides on the appeals process and

would you like to see us pull out of the

well i think it's absolutely crucial

it's a pragmatic sensible approach to

we can't just decide we're changing it

i think what's important in relation to

that that involves removals we want to

course countries that source where a lot

this this issue simply cannot be tackled
